name: HEARING TEST
title: Assess Your Hearing Health
instructions: Answer the following questions based on your hearing health symptoms. Score: 1 = Never, 2 = Sometimes, 3 = Frequently, 4 = Often, 5 = Always. Total score at the end of each section will let you know your hearing health risks and suggested recommendations immediately.

sections.name: hearing-health
sections.title: Hearing Loss & Auditory Health
sections.description: Smoking reduces oxygen supply to the inner ear, leading to hearing loss over time.

questions.question: Do you often ask people to repeat themselves while talking?
Do you have constant ringing in your ears (tinnitus)?
Do you struggle to hear in noisy environments?
Have you experienced sudden or gradual hearing loss?
Have you been diagnosed with hearing impairment?
